text: aur isamen bhee tum par koee gunaah nahin jo tum un auraton ko vivaah ke sandesh saanketik roop se do ya apane man mein chhipae rakho. allaah jaanata hai ki tum unhen yaad karoge, parantu chhipakar unhen vachan na dena, sivaay isake ki saamaany niyam ke anusaar koee baat kah do. aur jab tak nirdhaarit avadhi (iddat) pooree na ho jae, vivaah ka naata jodane ka nishchay na karo. jaan rakho ki allaah tumhaare man kee baat bhee jaanata hai. atah usase saavadhaan raho aur allaah atyant kshama karanevaala, sahanasheel hai
